hero.headline: Website Analysis with Professional PDF Reports

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs

q1.question: What PDF report formats are available?
q1.answer: We offer three professional PDF report formats: Executive Summary (compact overview for decision makers), Technical Deep-Dive (detailed technical analysis) and Action Plan (concrete recommendations with priorities).

q2.question: What is included in the Enhanced CSV Export?
q2.answer: The Enhanced CSV Export contains over 20 data fields including Core Web Vitals, Google PageSpeed Scores, Technology Stack, Marketing Tools, Security Assessment, SEO Metrics and detailed performance data.

q3.question: How does the tool differ from SEOptimer or similar platforms?
q3.answer: Our tool offers professional PDF reports at a fraction of the cost of SEOptimer (â‚¬79/month). You get the same quality analysis with Executive Summaries, detailed technical reports and Action Plans.

q4.question: What data sources are used for analysis?
q4.answer: We use Google PageSpeed Insights API, Core Web Vitals Monitoring, DNS lookups, technology detection and comprehensive SEO metrics for accurate and reliable analysis.

q5.question: Is there an API for integration?
q5.answer: Yes, Enterprise customers get access to our API for seamless integration into existing workflows and automated report generation.

q6.question: How fast are reports generated?
q6.answer: Standard analyses are completed in 30-60 seconds. PDF reports are automatically generated and can be downloaded immediately.
